about_the_game:
Chaos grips the land as factions vie for ever greater power. In these tumultuous times, heroes rise—heroes who have even overthrown the gods. To counter this new threat, the gods have chosen you as their avatar, one who can wield their divine power. The weight of great responsibility now rests on your shoulders: disguise yourself as masters of various styles to learn all forms of martial arts, sow discord among the factions, and deliver bloody retribution where needed. It's time to shake up the chessboard of destiny!

[Master Numerous Characters]


Say goodbye to your old self and assume the guise of one of nearly 30 martial geniuses—one at a time! Harness their talents and abilities as your own, and rise to the top!

[Merge & Upgrade Skills]


1v1 Duels 101:

Exploit your enemy’s weaknesses and counter fire with water—make every skill hit like a ten-ton hammer!

Upgrade, grow, and unlock an array of passive effects—there’s no limit to your potential!

Fill up a row of skills and prepare a massive strike—amass your power, and mountains shall topple before you!

[Huge Selection of Skills]


Choose from over 100 skills, each upgrade bringing profound transformation.

[Collect Relics]


Discard cards like a champ and use your dice wisely to gain the upper hand. Preparation is half the battle—alter your dice with skills and turn the tide in times of danger.

Collect over 200 relics to enhance your strength. Choose the best combinations that suit your style and crush all opposition!

[Gather Treasures & Strategize]


  • Travel the land and make your choice in over 30 random events.

  • Build your wealth, trade for key resources, and hunt for exotic treasures.

  • Recruit minions to, uh... execute "fair" sneak attacks on your enemies? Well, history is written by the victor!

short_description: Ultimate Hero is a rogue-lite deckbuilder with a twist of dice. Master and merge unique skills, counter enemies, and unleash devastating ultimates where they hurt the most! Challenge the finest martial artists in the realm, and defy the odds to claim the title of the Ultimate Hero.
